Reviews.Content: Great Location I stayed at this hotel for a couple of days. It is an old building, rooms are very small, specially the bathroom!!!Breakfast was awful, bad service and bad food, close to the hotel were some small grocery stores where you can buy some OJ, Yogurt, cookies and water.Great location from Paseo de la Reforma, just 1 block away!
Reviews.Author: ticoSanJose

Reviews.Content: Not good Certainly is a cheap hotel but a couple of friends got a way better hotel in great location for the same price. Premier at the DF needs remodeling, the building is so old and make sure you get a non-smoking room if you want to get a breathe. No air conditioning on the rooms and sometimes Mexico could be hot.Good luck
Reviews.Author: crislab4

Reviews.Content: Filthy - bugs Washroom and shower crawled with ants and other. Bedroom merely dirty. Dinning uncertain , if able to locate both waiter and cook. Altogether an unpleasant experience in an otherwise unique and interesting city. Al April/06.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
